articles.title: Multibagger stock: 950% RETURN in 2 years! Ashnisha Industries signs MoU with Gujarat govt to set up green energy projects - ET Now
articles.description: Multibagger Stock: Ashnisha Industries is engaged in the manufacturing and trading of steel and steel alloy products. The company had last year forayed into renewable energy.
